casebody.data:
Peter Born, respondent, v. Henry Schrenkeisen, et al., appellants. Decided February 2, 1885. Appeal by defendants from judgment against them entered on decision of judge at special term. Porter & Kilvert, for appellants. Wehle & Jordan, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J. and Truax, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, on opinion of the judge at special term.
